company_commercial_names: indigma modern indian bistro | indigma bistro
locations: us, united states, maryland, baltimore, 21201, cathedral street, 900, 39.2997082, -76.6173826
short_description: indigma modern indian bistro is an indian restaurant based in baltimore, maryland, united states.
long_description: indigma modern indian bistro located in mount vernon, baltimore serves up traditional dishes with a modern flair. it's where old meets new and where daring flavors are elevated in a bold backdrop. indigma's name was created by owner, tony chemmanoor, and his family by fusing the words 'indian' and 'enigma' together. at indigma, we invite our guests to go on a culinary journey to explore the mysterious flavors found in indian cuisine. our menu features small plates to share, clay oven breads, tandoori specialties and sizzlers, as well as entrees from land, sea, and garden. the bistro bar offers an extensive wine list, beer unique to india, as well as handcrafted cocktails. our expert chefs prepare each meal to perfection using only the best hand selected spices and the freshest ingredients. at indigma, we pour our heart and soul into every dish. the best indian food in baltimore.
business_tags: chicken & seafood | indian foods | wine list & beer | tandoori specialties | land & sea | traditional dishes | indian cuisine | small plates | bistro bar | cocktails | online ordering & menu
generated_description: indigma bistro is a full-service restaurant located in mount vernon, baltimore, maryland. the restaurant specializes in modern indian cuisine, offering traditional dishes with a modern twist. named by owner tony chemmanoor, the bistro features a variety of small plates, clay oven breads, tandoori specialties, and sizzlers. the menu includes dishes from north india to south india, and the dining room is known for its vibrant atmosphere. indigma bistro also features a bistro bar with an extensive wine list, unique indian beers, and handcrafted cocktails. the restaurant prides itself on using the best hand-selected spices and the freshest ingredients to prepare each meal.
